baseInfo.asi: +1 to any two different ability scores, -1 to any one ability score

traits.name: Magical Awareness
traits.description: Sense strong magic (1st+ level spells, magic items) within 30ft (no location/nature).

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Choose one ability score. It increases by 2.

traits.name: Human Determination
traits.description: Once per long rest, reaction to add 1d4 to an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw for self or ally within 30ft.

traits.name: Undying
traits.description: Succeed on death saving throws on a roll of 9 or higher.

traits.name: Versatile Training
traits.description: Proficiency in one skill, one tool, and one simple or martial weapon.

traits.name: Unbreakable
traits.description: Advantage on death saves. Regain Level + Prof Bonus HP when stabilized or healed at 0 HP.

traits.name: Quick Learner
traits.description: Proficiency in one additional skill or tool.

traits.name: Cultural Memory
traits.description: Learn two additional languages.

traits.name: Explorer’s Tenacity
traits.description: Ignore non-magical difficult terrain. Advantage on Con saves vs. exhaustion from forced marches/environment.

traits.name: Arcane Curiosity
traits.description: Learn one Wizard cantrip (Charisma casting).

traits.name: Spell Dabbler
traits.description: Learn one 1st-level Wizard spell (cast 1/long rest, Charisma casting).

traits.name: Channel Spark
traits.description: 1/long rest, add 1d4 to one spell attack roll or increase DC by 1d4 for one target.

traits.name: Counter-Instinct
traits.description: 1/short rest, reaction for advantage on save vs. spell/magical effect.

traits.name: Multi Magical
traits.description: +1 spell prepared/known for one class.

traits.name: Magical Mimicery
traits.description: Learn spells from another class list (1 at L2, +1 every 2 levels).

traits.name: Overconfident
traits.description: Nat 1 attack/check -> disadvantage on next same type attack/check.

traits.name: Impetuous
traits.description: Disadvantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Cultural Disregard
traits.description: Disadvantage on Insight/Persuasion/Deception with different cultures (unless shared language).

traits.name: Healing Hands
traits.description: 1/Long Rest, action touch to restore HP = Level + Con mod.

traits.name: Virtuous Symbol
traits.description: Glowing celestial symbol appears when using divine abilities/Revelation. (Cannot take with Healing Hands).

traits.name: Celestial Resistance
traits.description: Resistance to Radiant and Necrotic damage.

traits.name: Celestial Revelation
traits.description: 1/Long Rest, bonus action, transform for 1 min. Choose one effect below:

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: See in dim light within 60ft as bright, darkness as dim.

traits.name: Divine Presence
traits.description: Advantage on Influence checks with those respectful of divine beings.

traits.name: Celestial Grace
traits.description: Advantage on saves vs. Charmed or Frightened.

traits.name: Radiant Pulse
traits.description: 1/Combat, when reduced to 0 HP (not killed), reaction: chosen creatures in 10ft regain 1 HP. Then fall Unconscious.

traits.name: Virtue of Mercy
traits.description: Stabilized creature regains HP = half Level (up). 1/Long Rest, Stabilize as Free Action when adjacent.

traits.name: Celestial Tongue
traits.description: Speak/Read/Write Celestial. Advantage on History/Religion checks about divine/celestial beings.

traits.name: Aura of Warmth
traits.description: Allies within 10ft gain Advantage on saves vs. extreme cold and Frightened condition.

traits.name: Sacred Legacy
traits.description: Choose one 1st-level Cleric/Paladin spell. Cast 1/Long Rest (Charisma casting).

traits.name: Seraphic Endurance
traits.description: Advantage on saves vs. Exhaustion. Recover 1 Exhaustion level on Short Rest.

traits.name: Beacon of Hope
traits.description: 1/Long Rest, reaction when ally in 25ft fails save: allow reroll (must use new result).

traits.name: Luminous Recovery
traits.description: First time regaining HP in combat, gain Temp HP = Level + Con mod.

traits.name: Wings of Grace
traits.description: Spectral wings: Fly Speed = Movement Speed. Controlled Falling (no fall damage if conscious).

traits.name: Burden of Legacy
traits.description: Visible birthmarks -> Disadvantage on Stealth checks.

traits.name: Divine Expectation
traits.description: 1/session, Disadvantage on first check/save related to defying tradition/expectation.

traits.name: Overwhelming Radiance
traits.description: Cannot benefit from Hide Action unless heavily obscured or magically concealed.

traits.name: Marked by Destiny
traits.description: Disadvantage on the first Death Saving Throw each session.

traits.name: Celestial Isolation
traits.description: Disadvantage on Persuasion/Deception with non-religious NPCs unless succeed DC 10 Insight first.

traits.name: Heaven’s Burden
traits.description: Need 8 uninterrupted hours for Long Rest benefits.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.description: Advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

traits.name: Predict Weather
traits.description: Accurately predict natural weather for next hour (1-mile radius). Never caught off guard by mundane weather changes. (Cannot take with Gnome Cunning).

traits.name: Nature Whisperer
traits.description: Advantage on Animal Handling & Nature checks (identifying plants/animals, diagnosing natural afflictions).

traits.name: Speak with Small Beasts
traits.description: Communicate simple ideas with Small or smaller beasts via sounds/gestures.

traits.name: Natural Illusionist
traits.description: Know the Minor Illusion cantrip (Intelligence casting).

traits.name: Woodcarver's Skill
traits.description: Proficiency with woodcarver's tools.

traits.name: Artificer's Lore
traits.description: Double proficiency bonus on History checks related to magic items, alchemy, or tech devices.

traits.name: Tinker
traits.description: Proficiency with tinker's tools. Can spend 1hr & 10gp materials to make a Tiny clockwork device (Toy, Fire Starter, or Music Box) lasting 24hrs. Max 3 active.

traits.name: Skilled Merchant
traits.description: When selling own goods/services, use Int/Wis/Cha for Persuasion/Deception/Performance checks & double proficiency bonus.

traits.name: Mason’s Aptitude
traits.description: Proficiency with mason's tools.

traits.name: Superior Darkvision
traits.description: Darkvision radius becomes 120 feet.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.description: Advantage on Stealth checks to hide in rocky terrain.

traits.name: Svirfneblin Magic
traits.description: Know Message cantrip. L3: Disguise Self 1/long rest. L5: Nondetection (self only) 1/long rest. (Int casting).

traits.name: Stone Sense
traits.description: Advantage on Investigation/Perception checks for unusual stonework, hidden passages, or stone instability.

traits.name: No Stranger to the Sun
traits.description: Resistance to fire damage. Naturally adapted to hot climates.

traits.name: Flame-Hardened Skin
traits.description: When taking fire damage, gain +Prof Bonus to AC until start of next turn (once per round).

traits.name: Sand Shaper
traits.description: Know Mold Earth cantrip. L3: Earth Tremor 1/long rest. L5: Wall of Sand 1/long rest. (Int casting).

traits.name: Snow Born
traits.description: Resistance to cold damage. Naturally adapted to cold climates.

traits.name: Snow Burrow
traits.description: Bonus action to burrow into snow (1ft+ deep). Burrow speed 15ft. Total cover while burrowed. Emerge as bonus action.

traits.name: Ice Magic
traits.description: Know Shape Water cantrip (ice/snow only). L3: Armor of Agathys (1st level) 1/long rest. L5: Sleet Storm 1/long rest. (Int casting).

traits.name: Crystal Clear Vision
traits.description: Truesight 5ft. Advantage on saves vs. Blinded & checks vs. illusions/shapechanging within 30ft.

traits.name: Resonance Crystal
traits.description: Personal crystal focus. Grants minor passive benefit or active ability (Prof Bonus uses/long rest) based on gem type (GM discretion).

traits.name: Light Weaver
traits.description: Know Light cantrip (mentally control radius). L3: Color Spray 1/long rest. L5: Daylight 1/long rest. (Int casting).

traits.name: Escape Artist
traits.description: Advantage on checks/saves to avoid or escape Grappled/Restrained.

traits.name: Magnified Vision
traits.description: Advantage on Investigation checks to examine something held or within 5ft.

traits.name: Mental Clarity
traits.description: Advantage on saves vs. Dazed or Stunned (if conditions exist).

traits.name: Strong-Minded
traits.description: Mental Defense (MD) increases by 1 (Requires GM definition).

traits.name: Mana Increase
traits.description: Max Mana Points (MP) increase by Prof Bonus (Requires GM definition).

traits.name: Trapper
traits.description: Proficiency with thieves' tools. Advantage on checks to detect traps & Dex checks to disarm/set simple traps.

traits.name: Lightning Insulation
traits.description: Resistance to lightning damage. Natural lightning strikes targeting area automatically miss you.

traits.name: Trade Expertise
traits.description: Choose Crafting/Subterfuge trade. Mastery Cap & Level +1 (Requires GM definition).

traits.name: Storm Knowledge
traits.description: Advantage on Survival checks during storms & Nature checks on weather phenomena.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: Disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks relying on sight in direct sunlight.

traits.name: Short-Legged
traits.description: Speed reduced by 5 feet (to 20ft total).

traits.name: Agility Decrease
traits.description: Dexterity score decreased by 1 (min 1).

traits.name: Elemental Vulnerability
traits.description: Choose Fire, Cold, or Lightning. Vulnerability to damage of that type.

traits.name: Oblivious
traits.description: Disadvantage on Perception checks to detect hidden creatures/objects not directly in line of sight.
